sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
[The] Judgment of the reformed churches that a man may lawfully not only put away his vvife for her adultery, but also marry another.
[2], 78 p.
printed for Andrew Crook at the Green Dragon in Pauls Churchyard, London : 1652.
Caption and running titles read: Of the lawfulness of marriage upon a lawful divorce. Reproduction of the original in the Lampeter, St. David's University College, University Library. Dummmy Imperfect. Copy catalogued is torn at head, affecting text.
=======
